translation.en: [man, in Zulu] God has plans.
Life is tricky.
It is unpredictable and hard to understand.
Things don't always happen the way we want them to.
translation.ko: 항상 우리가 원하는 대로 풀리는 것도 아니에요

translation.en: And that's okay with me.
[woman 1, in English] Senzo Meyiwa,
the 27-year-old captain and goalkeeper of the South African national football team,
has been shot and killed.
[man 1, echoing] A national tragedy.
For me, this is a national tragedy.
-[sirens] -[woman 2] Soccer star Senzo Meyiwa,
murdered in an apparent robbery at his girlfriend's home.
translation.ko: 여자 친구 집에서 강도 사건으로 사망했습니다

translation.en: [woman 3] …shot dead at the Vosloorus home of singer Kelly Khumalo.
translation.ko: 가수 켈리 쿠말로가 소유한 보스룰러스 자택에서 총에 맞았죠

translation.en: [woman 4] I am one person who thrives in her truth.
And I also believe that if you own your truth, no one can use it against you.
translation.ko: 내 진실만 확고하다면 누구도 그걸 내게 불리하게 쓸 수 없죠

translation.en: [woman 1] Police say he was in a house with seven other people when it happened.
translation.ko: 경찰은 사고 당시 센조 외에 7명이 더 있었다고 밝혔습니다 "살해 당일 집 안에 있던 사람들"

translation.en: If it's more than a robbery that went wrong, what can it be?
[man 2] Senzo's life is like a safe,
where you go inside it and then you find another safe
translation.ko: 안에 들어가면 다른 금고가 또 있고

translation.en: and another safe… [chuckles]
Police now say it was a hit.
[man 3] This was an assassination.
The robbery was a cover-up.
[woman 5] Why would you kill your husband?
Why? For what?
[man 4] People like Kelly might help to solve this case.
translation.ko: 켈리 같은 사람이 사건 해결을 도울 수 있어요

translation.en: People like Longwe, they're not saying anything.
translation.ko: 롱웨 같은 사람이 입을 꾹 다물고 있습니다

translation.en: [chanting, in Zulu] Kelly is a dog! Kelly is a dog!
[in English] After six years, police finally arrested
translation.ko: 6년이 흐른 후 마침내 경찰이 살인의 배후에 있는 용의자 여러 명을 체포했습니다

translation.en: several suspects they believe are behind the murder.
translation.ko: 마침내 경찰이 살인의 배후에 있는 용의자 여러 명을 체포했습니다

translation.en: [man 5, in Zulu] They are hitmen and they kill, but I know they're not involved in Senzo's case.
translation.ko: 그들이 살인 청부업자이긴 한데 센조 사건엔 개입 안 했어요

translation.en: [man 6, in Zulu] The people in the house are hiding something.
translation.ko: 그 집에 있던 사람들이 무언가를 감추고 있어요

translation.en: The truth always comes out.
[man 7, in English] We've lost a captain. We've lost a father, a brother, a friend.
translation.ko: 우린 주장을 잃었어요 아버지, 형제, 친구를 잃었습니다

translation.en: [woman 6, in Zulu] Everyone who was in that house…
and I mean everyone, they know who killed my child.
translation.ko: 누가 내 아들을 죽였는지 알고 있어요

translation.en: [crying] Why did my child leave me?
[woman 3, in English] The Bafana Bafana and Orlando Pirates captain
was shot dead at the Vosloorus home of singer Kelly Khumalo.
translation.ko: 가수 켈리 쿠말로의 자택에서 총격으로 사망했습니다

translation.en: [man] The national football captain was visiting his girlfriend,
who is a well-known musician in her own right.
translation.ko: 여자 친구의 집에 방문해 있던 중이었습니다

translation.en: The couple have a seven-month-old daughter together.
[man, in English] Late that night, I received a call from
the provincial commissioner responsible for the detectives,
and he informed me that, um…
Bafana Bafana's goalkeeper Senzo Meyiwa has been gunned down.
translation.ko: 대표팀 골키퍼 센조 메이와가 총격을 당했다고 하셨습니다

translation.en: -Me and my team, we rushed to the scene. -[siren wailing]
There were many people outside the yard
and inside the yard.
The duty officer on standby was there from the local detectives.
translation.ko: 지역 수사팀의 당직 형사가 거기서 대기하고 있었어요

translation.en: And I also found the MEC for Public Safety.
Then we cleared the scene, and together we sat inside in the house
translation.ko: 현장을 정리하고 다 같이 집 안에 들어가

translation.en: to interview the family as to what happened.
People in the house saying that it was a robbery that went wrong.
translation.ko: 집 안에 있던 사람들은 강도가 우발적으로 벌인 범죄라고 했죠

translation.en: [in English] Unfortunately, Senzo tried to protect Kelly
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 센조는 켈리를 보호하려다 그렇게 됐어요

translation.en: because one of the guys was pointing a firearm,
translation.ko: 그들 중 총을 든 한 사람이

translation.en: a gun, at-- at Kelly,
and when he did that, they-- they shot him from the back.
translation.ko: 센조가 켈리를 막아서니까 등 뒤에서 총을 쐈어요

translation.en: [Sibiya] As they explained what happened,
translation.ko: 목격자들의 설명을 들으니 집 안에 사람들이 있었는데

translation.en: they were in the house and two people came in.
translation.ko: 목격자들의 설명을 들으니 집 안에 사람들이 있었는데 두 명이 침입했고

translation.en: And then Senzo tried to jump on one as they were robbing them,
translation.ko: 센조가 강도 중 한 명을 덮치려고 하자

translation.en: and then they shot at him.
[man, in English] My phone started going crazy.
They were talking about being at Kelly's house, drama, guns being drawn.
translation.ko: "로버트 마라와 스포츠 방송인" 켈리 집에 있었다, 막장 드라마다 총격이 있었다 등 말이 많았어요

translation.en: There was something about a break-in, but what did they take?
They just took his life away.
But why him, if there's a room full of people?
translation.ko: 방에 사람이 가득 있는데 하필 왜 센조였을까?

translation.en: You know, stories that weren't really making sense.
What was the motive, you know?
Because here's a football player who…
was either fighting to win with his club…
translation.ko: 소속 클럽의 우승을 위해 열심히 싸웠고

translation.en: …or had a big broad smile, who was loved by the fans.
translation.ko: 환한 웃음으로 팬들의 사랑을 받았던 사람이죠

translation.en: Senzo was at the height of his career when he passed away.
translation.ko: 센조는 경력 최고의 전성기에 목숨을 잃었습니다

translation.en: [Thomas Mlambo] Just tell us your name, your position, and how long you've been at the club.
translation.ko: 이름과 포지션 클럽 소속 기간을 말해주세요

translation.en: Ah, my name is Senzo Meyiwa,
Orlando Pirates goalkeeper,
and I've been ten years at Orlando Pirates.
[Thomas] For ten years?
[Mark Gleeson] Header!
And Meyiwa saves.
And that game in the rain was arguably the best I had seen him play…
translation.ko: 센조는 우중에서 치른 그 경기에서 최고의 활약을 펼쳤어요

translation.en: given the conditions.
You know when you say people are playing the game of their lives?
translation.ko: '어느 선수의 인생 경기다'라는 말 들어본 적 있죠?

translation.en: He was playing the game of his life.
Although we did not know that it was going to be the last game of his life.
translation.ko: 하지만 인생 마지막 경기가 될 줄은 몰랐죠

translation.en: [Gleeson] Lots of movement in the box. Dolly goes for the goal!
translation.ko: 문전에 움직임이 많은 가운데 돌리가 골을 노립니다!

translation.en: Meyiwa makes a very good save again.
[Brian Mathe] He's an experienced goalkeeper.
He goes for safety. Didn't try to catch the ball outright.
translation.ko: 신중을 기하느라 공에 성급하게 손을 대지 않았죠

translation.en: Good shot, as well. Very intriguing.
[Gleeson] He really gave it pace at the end there.
[Senzo's mother, in Zulu] We didn't watch Senzo when he played soccer.
translation.ko: 우리는 센조가 경기하는 날엔 중계를 안 봤어요

translation.en: His father would always watch the next day.
translation.ko: 애 아빠는 꼭 다음 날에야 경기를 봤죠

translation.en: I asked his father to call and tell him we were watching.
translation.ko: 그날 저는 경기 본다고 아들한테 알리라고 했어요

translation.en: His father sent a message saying, "Senzo, we are watching you here."
translation.ko: 애 아빠가 메시지를 보냈죠 '센조, 우리 경기 보고 있다'

translation.en: After each game, his father would text him and advise him on his mistakes.
translation.ko: "이레너 메이와 센조의 어머니" 경기를 다 보고 나면 남편이 문자로 실수를 짚어줬어요

translation.en: His dream was to play for Pirates and God granted him that wish.
translation.ko: 파이리츠에 들어가는 게 우리 아들 꿈이었는데 신께서 소원을 들어주셨어요

translation.en: He loved Pirates so much. He really loved Pirates.
translation.ko: 걔는 파이리츠를 사랑했어요 파이리츠를 진심으로 사랑했죠

translation.en: When they lost a game he would cry.
So, I asked his father, "Has he not responded yet?"
He said, "No, not yet." I said, "He will answer."
translation.ko: 남편이 아직이라길래 제가 그랬죠, '답은 꼭 올 거야'

translation.en: I don't know how people found out. They just started arriving.
translation.ko: 어떻게 알았는지 몰라도 사람들이 집으로 몰려왔어요

translation.en: [crying] It was really tough.
When he died, I also died.
translation.ko: 아들이 세상을 떴을 때 나도 죽었어요

translation.en: I remember him sitting on my bed. My old, broken bed.
translation.ko: 내 낡고 망가진 침대에 앉아서 아들이 했던 말이 기억나요

translation.en: He said, "Mom, I will buy you a bed."
Senzo would support us.
We would eat, there was nothing he didn't do for us.
translation.ko: 덕분에 먹고 살았죠 우리한테 안 해준 게 없었어요

translation.en: Why did my child leave me?
translation.ko: 내 자식이 왜 나를 떠나야 했죠?

translation.en: Today, I cry alone.
[woman 1, in English] We now cross live to our reporter who's at the family home at Umlazi in Durban.
translation.ko: 더반 움라지의 부모님 댁에 있는 기자를 생방송으로 연결하겠습니다

translation.en: [reporter] His mother has been unable, really, to accept the news,
as she was then rushed off to hospital,
of course, as she got the news in the early hours of this morning.
translation.ko: 어머니가 소식을 들은 건 오늘 새벽이었습니다

translation.en: His siblings are inside, his father is also here.
translation.ko: 형제들이 집 안에 있고 아버지도 안에 있습니다

translation.en: -[singing] -♪ Rest in peace, Senzo Meyiwa! ♪
[woman 1] Although Senzo Meyiwa's death is a tragic loss,
fans of Orlando Pirates in Umlazi are determined to celebrate his life.
translation.ko: 움라지의 올랜도 파이리츠 팬들은 그의 삶을 기리고자 합니다

translation.en: Irvin Khoza, the club's head, personally paid his respects at Meyiwa's home.
translation.ko: 구단주 어빈 코자가 메이와의 집을 직접 찾아 조문했습니다

translation.en: [in English] Why Senzo?
If that question can be answered, I'd be the happiest person.
translation.ko: 그 답만 알아낸다면 더 바랄 게 없겠습니다

translation.en: To give a full report to the father,
because he gave the boy to me when he was only 14 years old.
[Khoza] In this place where we are, it's Umlazi.
These places were the dumping grounds by apartheid,
translation.ko: 인종 차별 정책 때문에 우리가 내던져진 곳입니다

translation.en: for us not to make it in life.
But people like Senzo Meyiwa emerged from this township,
translation.ko: 하지만 센조 메이와 같은 이들이 이 흑인 거주구에서 성장해

translation.en: and became not only warriors but heroes of millions of South African youth.
translation.ko: 이 흑인 거주구에서 성장해 수백만 남아공 청소년을 대표하는 투사이자 영웅이 됐습니다

translation.en: [Don Riddell] He was a very accomplished player, and he was really just entering
translation.ko: 선수로서 기량이 탁월했던 그는 경력의 황금기로

translation.en: a particularly exciting phase of his career.
He'd only played six times for the national side,
known as Bafana Bafana in South Africa,
and he was on the brink of leading them to the African Cup of Nations.
translation.ko: 주장으로 아프리카 네이션스컵 본선 진출을 이끌고 있었죠

translation.en: Obviously, I started as a striker.
[in Zulu] I was a top striker.
[in English] No, I started as a striker.
[in Zulu] We used to play using small poles in the township.
translation.ko: 흑인 거주구에 있는 작은 기둥을 골대 삼아 공을 찼죠

translation.en: Then Pirates held trials in 2002.
[in English] My parents didn't have money. They had to borrow money from neighbors.
translation.ko: 돈이 없었던 부모님은 이웃에서 빌려야 했죠

translation.en: "My son is going for trials."
There was a lot of kids there.
They gave you five minutes for the trials.
So obviously, they must see something from you.
Even if they don't come and shoot,
what are you doing as a keeper in your goalposts?
translation.ko: 골문 앞에서 골키퍼 역할에 충실해야 하죠

translation.en: I think I used that.
[Gleeson] Twenty years old. His first derby today.
Even if I don't know the players,
"Hey, come inside. Check man behind. Watch on your right shoulder."
translation.ko: '이봐, 한 명 있다 안으로 들어와' '뒤쪽 선수 조심해 오른쪽 옆을 잘 봐'

translation.en: [Gleeson] Meyiwa has even less experience then Khune.
[Senzo] You know, "Keeper's ball!"
That's why I managed to-- to survive on those trials.
translation.ko: 그래서 입단 테스트를 무사히 통과할 수 있었죠

translation.en: I think keeping, it's something that…
It was in me.
I'm the best keeper in the world.
[in English] If you want to communicate with us, and obviously, tonight it's a big one.
translation.ko: 여러분과 의견을 나누도록 하죠 오늘 큰 사건이 있었으니까요

translation.en: What's your reaction to this?
[caller 1, in Zulu] This Senzo thing is too painful.
[caller 2] Senzo's story is not okay. Not at all.
[caller 3] We are heartbroken about Senzo!
He was so determined to play internationally one day,
translation.ko: 언젠가 세계 무대에 서려고 매진하던 선수였어요!

translation.en: for Barcelona, for Manchester United!
translation.ko: 바르셀로나, 맨체스터 유나이티드 어디든 갈 수 있었는데!

translation.en: [reporter, in English] And so this is the scene of the crime.
This house here behind me, that's where Senzo Meyiwa was shot last night.
translation.ko: 제 뒤로 보이는 집에서 어젯밤 센조 메이와가 총에 맞았죠

translation.en: Three men came in, and they fired a shot that led to the death
translation.ko: 남성 3명이 침입해 총을 쐈고 사망에 이르렀습니다

translation.en: of the South African national football captain.
[man, in English] I work for a Sunday publication.
My boss said,
"This story is of national interest. This is the national goalkeeper."
translation.ko: '국민적 관심이 집중된 사건이야 국대 골키퍼 얘기지'

translation.en: "I want you guys to help with your skills, so we can get to the bottom of this."
translation.ko: '자네들의 재능으로 이 사건의 진상 규명에 일조하길 바라네'

translation.en: When the details started emerging
that it was inside the house and there were seven people inside the house,
translation.ko: 사건이 집 안에서 벌어졌고 그 자리에 여러 명이 있었죠

translation.en: I said, "We need to interview everyone who was in the house."
translation.ko: 전 집에 있었던 모든 사람을 인터뷰하자고 제안했어요

translation.en: First it was Kelly Khumalo, who was his girlfriend.
translation.ko: 우선은 센조의 애인인 켈리 쿠말로가 있었고

translation.en: Kelly Khumalo's two kids.
Her sister, Zandie.
Senzo's best friends,
as well as Longwe Twala, who was dating Zandie at the time.
And Kelly's mom.
Kelly Khumalo is a well-known pop star in South Africa.
translation.ko: 켈리 쿠말로는 남아공에서 유명한 팝 스타예요

translation.en: She said one thing very touching to me at the time.
translation.ko: 당시에 켈리의 이야기를 듣고 무척 가슴이 아팠죠

translation.en: She said, "He died in my arms."
[Kelly, in English] We're fighting the intruders…
and… gunshots.
And then Senzo ran into my hands,
I thought he was trying to protect me from these people,
only to find out that he had been shot.
It was very, very sad, and very… We were all touched.
[Kelly] And then when I held him, that's when I realized
he had blood on his chest and on his back.
And then that's when I tried…
Everybody tried in the house to take him to the hospital,
translation.ko: 집에 있던 모두가 병원에 데려가려고 움직였죠

translation.en: and we rushed.
I prayed until I ran out of words to say. [crying]
translation.ko: 더 할 말이 떠오르지 않을 때까지 기도했어요

translation.en: [Kelly] First of all, I have never seen a gun,
translation.ko: 일단 저는 총이란 걸 본 적이 없었어요

translation.en: ever in my life.
So imagine what I was going through.
I have children in my house
and I have my family in my house and there's these intruders in the house.
I… At some point, I forgot my children.
translation.ko: 어느 지점에는 아이들의 존재를 잊기도 했어요

translation.en: That's what happened to me at that point, and when I came back to my senses,
I remembered that, actually, I have children in the house.
translation.ko: 집 안에 아이들까지 있었다는 게 떠올랐어요

translation.en: And I wanted to protect my children.
At the same time, I wanted to protect myself.
translation.ko: 그와 동시에 나 자신도 지키고 싶었어요

translation.en: So it was just a whole lot of things happening at once,
and very confusing,
and… and I felt so powerless,
because I'm always that person who wants to protect.
translation.ko: 저는 항상 남을 지키겠다는 마음이 강한 사람이에요

translation.en: I'm always that person who wants to be there for the people who need me.
translation.ko: 누가 날 필요로 하면 꼭 곁을 지켜야만 하는 성격이죠

translation.en: But at that particular time, I just had to be there for myself.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 순간에는 나를 지켜야만 했어요

translation.en: [Kelly] I had a performance that day in Soweto,
and for some reason,
he had just decided that he wanted to spend the entire day with me.
translation.ko: 센조는 그날을 고스란히 저와 보내기로 했었죠

translation.en: And my sister was there.
And then we had invited another friend from KZN over.
translation.ko: 그러다가 콰줄루나탈에 사는 다른 친구도 초대했어요

translation.en: So the friend called, and it was time for us to go pick him up,
translation.ko: 친구한테 전화를 받고 저희가 데리러 가서

translation.en: so we picked him up.
[in English] Yeah, I remember. I was waiting for them there.
Whenever I'm going to meet Senzo, I was always happy.
Because I knew we were going to party and have some drinks.
Senzo was my best friend. He was everything to me. He was like a brother.
translation.ko: 센조는 제 절친이었고 전부였어요 형제 같은 친구였죠

translation.en: He was like… he was like a family member.
[in Zulu] When we got to the house,
Kelly's mom was there with the kids.
They prepared lunch together. It was Kelly's mom, Kelly, and Zandie.
translation.ko: "은톰비 켈리 어머니" 켈리 어머니, 켈리, 잔디가 점심을 준비했어요

translation.en: [in English] I don't even know where to start, hey.
Hmm…
[softly] Yeah.
I'm sorry.
[Zandie, in Zulu] We shared a Sunday meal that my mother had prepared, as usual.
translation.ko: 늘 그랬듯 엄마가 차린 일요일 식사를 같이 먹었어요

translation.en: Around sunset, Longwe called to say he was coming over.
translation.ko: 해질 때쯤 롱웨가 저를 만나러 온다고 전화했어요

translation.en: I said no problem, because my mom had prepared food.
translation.ko: 엄마가 음식 장만해 놓으셨으니 어서 오라고 했죠

translation.en: [wa Afrika, in English] My understanding is that Longwe and Zandie, it was a fresh love.
translation.ko: 제가 알기로 롱웨와 잔디는 새로 사귀기 시작한 사이였어요

translation.en: Longwe is the son of one of South Africa's most famous music producers,
translation.ko: 롱웨는 남아공에서 가장 유명한 음악 프로듀서의 아들이에요

translation.en: Sello Chicco Twala.
Kelly, at that time,
she was recording an album at Chicco's house.
She used to go there with Zandie,
and, most of the time, Longwe was there at the house.
So, they met, fell in love, and they started dating.
I came that day, innocently.
I just came to pick Zandie up,
but then Zandie told me that their mother has cooked Sunday lunch.
I loved Zandie at the time,
you know, I wanted also a good reputation towards the mother and everything.
translation.ko: 어머니와 주변 사람들에게 좋은 인상을 주고 싶은 마음에

translation.en: So, you know, I stayed.
[in Zulu] It all happened shortly before 9:00 p.m.
translation.ko: 사건이 벌어진 건 저녁 9시를 조금 앞둔 때였어요

translation.en: Shortly before 9:00.
[Tumelo, in Zulu] We were watching soccer.
Chelsea was playing Manchester.
Everyone was drinking that day.
[in English] A bang at the door, and the door opened. And it was two guys.
translation.ko: "켈리 쿠말로 음성 2017년 8월 녹음" 누가 문을 두드리더니 문이 열리고 남자 둘이 들어왔어요 "범행 현장 켈리 어머니의 집"

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] That's when the man with the short dreads and hat came in.
translation.ko: 짧은 드레드 머리에 모자를 쓴 남자가 들어왔어요

translation.en: He pointed a gun at us
and demanded money and cellphones.
I couldn't believe it. I thought he was playing.
translation.ko: 믿을 수가 없었죠 장난인 줄 알았어요

translation.en: Until I saw everyone's reaction and realized it was serious.
translation.ko: 나머지 사람들 반응을 보니까 그게 진짜더라고요

translation.en: [in English] I was actually the first to stand up to try and protect everyone.
translation.ko: "롱웨 트왈라 2018년 2월 인터뷰" 제가 제일 먼저 일어나서 사람들을 지키려고 했어요

translation.en: Not realizing that the other guy was…
translation.ko: 다른 침입자도 총을 든 건 그때까지 몰랐어요

translation.en: also had a gun, and pointed the gun at me.
translation.ko: 다른 침입자도 총을 든 건 그때까지 몰랐어요 그자가 제게 총을 겨눠서 저는 뛰쳐나갔어요

translation.en: And I actually ran out.
translation.ko: 그자가 제게 총을 겨눠서 저는 뛰쳐나갔어요

translation.en: [in Zulu] He pushed the first guy and ran past the second guy.
translation.ko: 롱웨는 첫 번째 남자를 밀치고 두 번째 남자를 지나서 달려갔어요

translation.en: [in English] I wanted to go get help, but it was late.
Neighbors and everyone was sleeping.
I didn't have my phone, I left it at the house,
so I couldn't call the cops.
[in Zulu] When we saw Longwe push him, everyone else jumped up.
translation.ko: "잔디 쿠말로 2018년 5월 인터뷰" 롱웨가 그 남자를 밀치는 걸 보고 다들 벌떡 일어났어요

translation.en: We tried to push both men towards the door.
translation.ko: 우리가 두 남자를 문 쪽으로 밀어내려고 시도하는 과정에서

translation.en: There was a scuffle back and forth.
We were all in the kitchen fighting these people.
[Zandie] Next thing, the gun went off…
When I heard the gunshot, I ran into the bathroom.
translation.ko: 총소리를 듣고 저는 욕실로 뛰어 들어갔어요

translation.en: I ran and hid in the bedroom.
The gunshot woke up Senzo's baby.
translation.ko: 총소리가 나는 바람에 센조의 아기가 깼어요

translation.en: I only realized when I came out of the room that Senzo had been shot.
translation.ko: 저는 그 방에서 나올 때가 돼서야 센조가 총에 맞은 걸 알았어요

translation.en: He was lying on the floor between the couch and the TV stand.
translation.ko: 소파와 TV 사이 바닥에 누워 있었어요

translation.en: I called Senzo's name…
then I started panicking and crying.
[in English] I never thought I would come here again.
translation.ko: 여기에 다시 오리라고는 생각도 못 했어요

translation.en: Just bring back the memories and stuff.
[in English] We couldn't even wait for an ambulance to arrive,
translation.ko: "켈리 쿠말로 음성 2018년 8월 녹음" 구급차가 오기까지 기다리면 안 될 것만 같았어요

translation.en: because for me, it felt like I would be giving up on him.
translation.ko: 구급차가 오기까지 기다리면 안 될 것만 같았어요 그를 포기하는 기분이었거든요

translation.en: [crying] I didn't want him to feel like I was giving up on him.
translation.ko: 제가 포기했다고 생각하는 건 원치 않았어요

translation.en: [Kelly] I keep thinking about it.
Why would somebody want to do that to such an amazing person?
translation.ko: 누가 뭐 때문에 그 멋진 사람에게 그런 짓을 저지르고자 했을까?

translation.en: He was at the peak of his career. He was doing so…
translation.ko: 선수 생활의 전성기를 맞아 너무도 잘하고 있었는데… "'더 클로즈업' 2015년 11월"

translation.en: You don't understand how happy he was.
translation.ko: 센조가 얼마나 행복했는지 상상도 못 할 거예요

translation.en: He was extremely happy with himself,
extremely comfortable with himself and his life.
translation.ko: 자기 자신과 삶에 더할 나위 없는 편안함을 느꼈죠

translation.en: How can somebody steal that away from him?
translation.ko: 감히 누가 그 행복을 빼앗을 수 있죠?

translation.en: From all of us.
I pray to God that one day, we are able to find those people and justice is-- is served.
translation.ko: 언젠가 그 사람들을 찾아내 정의를 실현해 달라고 기도해요

translation.en: [woman 1, in English] Police say he was in a house with seven other people when it happened.
translation.ko: 경찰은 사건 발생 당시 센조가 7명과 함께 있었다고 말합니다

translation.en: [woman 2] Meyiwa was the only person of the seven inside the house who was injured.
translation.ko: 메이와는 그 집 안에서 유일하게 상해를 입었죠

translation.en: [Marawa] But why him?
It was sudden, it was gruesome, it was brutal.
It was final.
You know? So people still had and held on to so many of the memories.
translation.ko: 사람들은 지금도 많은 추억을 간직하고 있어요

translation.en: So that is why people are still trying to piece it together.
translation.ko: 그러니까 지금까지도 사건의 실마리를 풀려고 애쓰죠

translation.en: What was the motive?
It was difficult to know and to think,
because there were so many different stories.
[man, in Zulu] They phoned me from the house when it happened.
translation.ko: 사건이 발생한 집에서 제게 전화가 걸려 왔습니다

translation.en: I gave the phone to my wife.
My wife asked "What's wrong?" I couldn't hear what they were saying.
translation.ko: "시피소 메이와 센조의 형" 무슨 말을 하는지 저는 알아들을 수가 없었거든요

translation.en: They said he's been shot.
"Senzo's been shot."
Like it was an accident.
I kept asking, "How?"
And they said, "It's true. He's been shot."
[Tumelo] Some neighbors helped us get Senzo into the car.
translation.ko: 이웃 몇 명이 도와줘서 센조를 차에 실었어요

translation.en: He was heavy.
And Kelly was driving very fast.
I was in the back, with Senzo's head on my lap.
translation.ko: 센조는 뒷자리에 제 무릎을 베고 누웠죠

translation.en: [Sifiso] I asked if he was alive.
"He's alive. We're rushing him to the hospital."
That's what they said.
[Tumelo] I knew something was wrong.
because he'd stopped breathing.
[in English] At some point, I left the room where they were trying to resuscitate him,
translation.ko: 의료진이 소생시키던 중에 전 그 방에서 나와버렸어요

translation.en: to pray, and all I heard was my mother screaming at the top of her voice.
translation.ko: 기도하려고요, 그런데 엄마의 날카로운 외침이 들렸어요

translation.en: [sobs] And then I knew that…
he was gone.
[in Zulu] I said to him, "Senzo, did you bring me here to watch you die?"
translation.ko: 제가 말했죠, '죽는 거 보여주려고 요하네스버그로 불렀어?'

translation.en: I remember I kissed him on his forehead.
I didn't even notice everyone arriving.
[in English] Everyone was fighting, wanting to go and see Senzo,
'cause they didn't believe that Senzo was shot.
translation.ko: 센조가 총에 맞았다는 걸 아무도 못 믿었거든요

translation.en: [in Zulu] When we got back to the house, the police were there.
[wa Afrika, in English] As a journalist, you know, you've got sources.
And then you go to them and say,
"Please, please, I'm begging,
if you know about this, please can I just have a look?"
translation.ko: '이 사건에 관해 안다면 저도 좀 볼 수 있게 해주세요'

translation.en: I was fortunate enough that I was shown the docket.
translation.ko: 사건 일지를 볼 수 있는 행운을 얻었어요

translation.en: There is one neighbor
who disposed an affidavit to say she ordered people to clean the house
translation.ko: 경찰에 진술을 했는데 켈리가 사람들한테 집을 청소하라고 했대요

translation.en: where Senzo was killed
and throw away whatever they were drinking,
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 마셨던 것도 다 버리라고요

translation.en: because she didn't want people to see
that Senzo died in a place where they were drinking.
translation.ko: 센조가 죽었다는 사실이 공개되는 걸 원치 않았죠

translation.en: And also, she didn't want people to see Senzo's blood.
translation.ko: 또한 센조의 피도 남들에게 보이기 싫었던 겁니다

translation.en: [in English] If there is any allegation of the house
translation.ko: 혹여 경찰이 도착하기 전에 "코모초 팔레인 전 과학수사대장"

translation.en: being cleaned before
the police arrived,
it's tampering.
You're supposed to be charging that person for defeating the ends of justice.
translation.ko: 정의 구현을 방해했다는 죄를 물어야 합니다

translation.en: Because that's-- that's exactly what it is.
Where are the charges? Why are they not before the courts?
translation.ko: 왜 죄를 묻지 않죠? 어째서 법정에 안 세웁니까?

translation.en: When we all arrived there, it was trampled upon already.
translation.ko: 우리가 도착했을 때 현장은 이미 엉망이 된 후였어요

translation.en: Personally, we never found
any bullet or empty cartridge.
translation.ko: 총알이나 빈 탄약통을 아예 못 찾았어요

translation.en: Senzo's case was broken…
at that crime scene.
[in English] If the house was cleaned, what about the hat?
translation.ko: 현장을 치웠다면 모자는 어떻게 된 거죠?

translation.en: Because that guy who entered the house,
was wearing a hat with the short dreads.
translation.ko: 짧은 드레드 머리에 모자를 쓰고 있었거든요

translation.en: So obviously, it belongs to him.
If the house was cleaned when we came back from hospital, what about the hat?
translation.ko: 청소를 했다면 병원에서 왔을 때 모자가 왜 있었을까요?

translation.en: [in Zulu] I'm not saying if it was cleaned or not, but the hat was found on the floor, right?
translation.ko: 청소를 했다, 안 했다가 아니라 바닥에 모자가 있던 건 맞잖아요?

translation.en: So why didn't the person who cleaned remove the hat?
translation.ko: 누군가 현장을 치웠다면 모자는 왜 그대로 뒀을까요?

translation.en: [Khoza] We want to indicate that as Orlando Pirates Football Club, we are devastated.
translation.ko: 저희 올랜도 파이리츠 FC는 황망한 마음을 감출 수 없습니다

translation.en: I said to the players, it's only fair that you must cry.
translation.ko: 선수들에게 말했죠 눈물을 흘릴 수밖에 없다고요

translation.en: Because it's not easy
to hold back emotions,
especially on an event
translation.ko: "어빈 코자 올랜도 파이리츠 FC 구단주" 특히 이러한 사건과

translation.en: like this one.
[Sifiso, in Zulu] Senzo was shot on the Sunday.
I left for Johannesburg on the Tuesday.
I went to choose a coffin.
The funeral was going to be paid for by Irvin.
[wa Afrika, in English] Irvin Khoza is one of the most powerful soccer administrators in South Africa.
translation.ko: 어빈 코자는 남아공에서 가장 힘 있는 축구 행정가예요

translation.en: We can say that he's the boss of South African soccer.
translation.ko: 남아공 축구의 보스라고 부를 수 있죠

translation.en: He's very good as an administrator.
[Khoza] For every nook and cranny, there's a football supporter.
So I'm saying that we're all supporters in this country.
translation.ko: 따라서 이 나라의 모든 서포터에게 알립니다

translation.en: Every corner of this country,
let them help us.
Because we don't want to speculate.
We want to know who killed Senzo.
Later on, we'll know why.
[Sifiso, in Zulu] What I heard about the night Senzo got shot
translation.ko: 제가 들은 얘기로는 센조가 총에 맞던 날 밤에

translation.en: is there was someone who was passing by.
I won't mention the person's name.
He heard the gunshots and hid.
He hid for more than two hours watching Kelly's home,
and didn't see any intruders exiting the gate.
It didn't happen.
No robbers entered that house.
Senzo…
was shot by someone in the house.
[Masechaba Ndlovu, in English] Who do you think killed your son?
[in Zulu] The person who killed Senzo
was one of those in the house.
translation.ko: "샘 메이와 - 센조의 아버지 2018년 라디오 인터뷰" 집 안에 있던 사람 중 한 명이었어요

translation.en: That boy, Tumelo Madlala, was there.
To be honest, I was angry with Tumelo.
translation.ko: 솔직히 저는 투멜로에게 화가 났어요 "이레너 메이와 센조의 어머니"

translation.en: I'm still angry at him.
Tumelo was there when Senzo was shot on the Sunday.
translation.ko: 센조가 총에 맞던 일요일에 투멜로도 거기 있었어요

translation.en: He only came back from Johannesburg on Thursday.
Only then did he come to us.
[Tumelo, in Zulu] I was still there because I was waiting for my phone.
The police took our phones that day in Vosloorus.
translation.ko: 그날 경찰이 보슬루러스에서 우리 휴대폰을 가져갔죠

translation.en: If I didn't stay at Kelly's, where I was initially visiting,
translation.ko: 애초에 켈리 집에 가기로 했는데 그 집에 묵지 않으면

translation.en: where was I going to stay?
Where was I going to stay?
Everyone in the house was crying.
translation.ko: 그 집에 있던 사람들 전부 다 울었어요

translation.en: Kelly would lock herself in the bedroom the whole day.
translation.ko: 켈리는 침실에 들어가서 종일 꼼짝을 안 했죠

translation.en: It wasn't pleasant in the house.
[Sifiso] Tumelo said Senzo was shot accidentally.
translation.ko: 투멜로는 센조가 총에 맞은 게 우발적 사고라고 했어요

translation.en: That's what he said. Senzo was shot by mistake.
translation.ko: 그 녀석이 그렇게 말했죠 실수로 쏜 총에 맞았다고요

translation.en: Surely if I call you, the first thing you would say is,
translation.ko: 제가 전화를 걸었다면 이렇게 말하는 게 맞지 않나요?

translation.en: "Robbers came in and shot your brother."
translation.ko: '강도들이 침입해서 돈을 빼앗고 형님 동생을 쐈어요'라는 식으로요

translation.en: Instead they made it sound like it was an accident.
translation.ko: 근데 그 사람들은 우연히 사고가 난 것처럼 말하더란 말이죠

translation.en: They said, "He's been shot."
[Tumelo, in Zulu] People believe I know something.
translation.ko: 사람들은 제가 뭔가 알고 있다고 믿어요

translation.en: That I'm being paid by someone.
Many things have been said about me on the radio.
translation.ko: 라디오에서도 저에 관해 별별 말을 다 하더군요

translation.en: Especially by Senzo's family.
Senzo's family is dealing with a wound, but I have that wound too.
translation.ko: 가족들도 상처에 시달리겠지만 그 일은 제게도 고통이에요

translation.en: That empty space they feel, I feel it too.
[Sifiso] Tumelo is a long-time friend of Senzo.
He was a few grades ahead at school.
They were best friends.
[Sifiso] That's what is confusing me.
I don't understand why they would lie.
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 왜 거짓말하는지 이해가 안 가거든요

translation.en: I know this is a cover-up.
I'm confused about why they won't speak up.
translation.ko: 왜 입을 안 여는 건지 혼란스러워요

translation.en: Maybe they were threatened.
This thing just brings me pain.
[man, in Zulu] It's a video, no pictures.
[Tumelo, in Zulu] This is where Senzo was building his dream house.
translation.ko: 여기는 센조가 늘 꿈꿔온 집을 짓던 자리예요

translation.en: It's been a long time, but we went there often.
translation.ko: 오래전 얘기지만 우리는 자주 이곳을 찾았어요

translation.en: My heart breaks when I see this place.
[Riah Phiyega, in English] We have put forward a reward.
This reward is on offer for any information
translation.ko: 가해자의 체포와 유죄를 이끌어낼 수 있다면 "리아 피예가 2014년 남아공 경찰청장"

translation.en: that could lead to the arrest and conviction of the perpetrators.
We believe that someone,
somewhere,
somehow,
knows something about this crime.
translation.ko: 이 범죄에 대한 정보를 갖고 있다고 믿습니다

translation.en: And we appeal to that person to come forward, talk to us as the police,
translation.ko: 그런 분이 있다면 나와서 저희 경찰에게 말씀해 주십시오

translation.en: so that we can really do justice to this investigation.
translation.ko: 그래야 이번 수사를 통한 정의 구현이 가능할 것입니다

translation.en: [woman, in Afrikaans] I got a call
from my national coordinator the morning after the murder.
translation.ko: 살해 다음 날 아침에 경찰청 조정관이 찾더군요

translation.en: She said she needed my services.
[in English] I'm Amanda Yvonne Steenkamp.
I'm a retired police officer in the facial identification unit.
translation.ko: 저는 안면 인식 팀에서 일하다 은퇴 경찰이에요

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] I asked to speak to the witnesses individually.
translation.ko: 목격자들과 개별 면담을 해달라는 요청을 받았어요 "아만다 스테인캄프 안면 인식 전문가"

translation.en: It's better because they can't confuse or influence one another.
translation.ko: "아만다 스테인캄프 안면 인식 전문가" 다른 증인에게 영향이나 혼동을 줄 수 있어서 개별 면담이 낫죠

translation.en: I can remember the first person I interviewed was Kelly Khumalo.
translation.ko: 처음 면담한 사람이 켈리 쿠말로였던 걸로 기억해요

translation.en: [in English] She compiled the face of the person who entered the premises first.
[in Afrikaans] She pointed out the eyes, she remembered. The nose was very narrow.
translation.ko: "몽타주 합성" 눈이 어땠는지 기억했고 코는 아주 좁았다고 했어요

translation.en: He had thin lips.
She remembered he was wearing a hat.
Next, I interviewed her sister.
She said that the hat fell off, showing his dreadlocks.
translation.ko: 모자가 벗겨지면서 드레드 머리가 보였다고 진술했죠

translation.en: Behind, medium length.
[in English] One has been described as tall and slender with dreadlocks.
translation.ko: 한 사람은 키가 크고 호리호리하며 드레드 머리였다고 알려졌고

translation.en: The other is short and well-built.
translation.ko: 또 한 명은 키가 작고 다부진 체형이었습니다

translation.en: The reward for information has been increased to 250,000,
and anyone with information has been asked to call Crime Stop.
translation.ko: 단서를 아는 분은 '크라임 스톱'으로 연락 주십시오

translation.en: [man, in English] A man has been arrested in connection with the murder of Bafana Bafana captain Senzo Meyiwa.
translation.ko: 축구 국가대표팀 주장 센조 메이와 살해 용의자가 체포됐습니다

translation.en: The suspect, who cannot be named until he appears in court…
[man, in English] There is a robbery that has taken place and there is a person that was killed
and therefore they will be charged for…
murder and robbery.
[man, in English] The suspect was apparently pointed out at an identity parade
and linked to the crime that occurred at the Vosloorus home
translation.ko: 가수 켈리 쿠말로의 모친이 살던 보슬루러스 자택에서 벌어진

translation.en: of the mother of singer Kelly Khumalo.
[in Zulu] He's hurt the entire nation of South Africa.
translation.ko: 남아공이란 나라 전체에 상처를 안긴 자예요

translation.en: Not just Pirates fans. Everyone is hurt.
translation.ko: 파이리츠 팬뿐 아니라 전 국민을 해쳤죠

translation.en: We don't want them arrested, we want them executed.
translation.ko: 체포 갖고는 안 돼요 처형하면 좋겠어요

translation.en: [woman] They must all be killed.
[woman, in English] The family of the alleged perpetrator
believes their family member is innocent.
[in Zulu] Stop your nonsense. I told you to leave her alone.
[woman, in English] They raised questions about the identikit.
[woman] Do you believe that you have the right person?
We are sure that the person that we have now charged
is one of the suspects that were involved in the incident.
translation.ko: 사건 용의자 중 한 명이란 확신을 갖고 있습니다

translation.en: [man, in English] …submissions made by it…
The National Prosecuting Authority is informing the nation is informing the nation
that, as of now,
there is no sufficient evidential material to put Mr. Mbatha to trial.

translation.en: This court orders the immediate release
translation.ko: 본 법정은 구금 중인 자모쿨레 음바타의

translation.en: of the accused Zamokuhle Mbatha from detention.
The accused had been identified in an identification parade by two persons.
translation.ko: 피고인은 범인 식별 절차에서 2명의 지목을 받았습니다

translation.en: Subsequent to that, more information came to light.
translation.ko: 그 이외에도 더 많은 정보가 드러났으나

translation.en: Information that was inconsistent with the identification parade.
[in English] Apparently, he was the poor guy who was washing Senzo's car.
translation.ko: 용의자는 센조의 차를 닦던 가엾은 사람이란 게 밝혀졌어요

translation.en: [Zamokuhle, in Zulu] They came to my home.
And accused me of doing it.
I didn't know how to respond. Anything I said, they took as a lie.
translation.ko: 아무 반응도 할 수가 없었어요 무슨 말을 해도 거짓말로 몰았죠

translation.en: I was traumatized over something I didn't do.
translation.ko: 하지도 않은 일 때문에 트라우마가 생겼어요

translation.en: After what happened, my life changed.
translation.ko: 그 일을 겪은 후 내 인생이 뒤집어졌어요 "자모쿨레 음바타"

translation.en: People believed I was guilty.
I was afraid to leave my home. I locked myself inside.
translation.ko: 집 밖으로 나가기가 두려워서 스스로 감금 생활을 했죠

translation.en: I couldn't look for a job.
I can't tell you how traumatized I was.
translation.ko: 트라우마가 얼마나 심했는지 말로는 설명이 안 돼요

translation.en: [Tumelo, in Zulu] When we went to the ID parade,
it was me, Kelly, and Kelly's mother.
It was all over the newspapers.
I didn't even know that Zamo. I don't know where he's from.
translation.ko: 자모쿨레란 사람은 알지도 못했죠 어디서 튀어나왔는지 몰라요

translation.en: The person who pointed him out was Kelly's mother.
translation.ko: 그 사람을 지목한 건 켈리의 어머니였어요

translation.en: [in English] Kelly Khumalo, her sister, her mom,
didn't tell the police that, "Sorry, but we know this guy."
translation.ko: 그 사람을 알았지만 경찰한테 그렇게 말하지 않았어요

translation.en: They allowed police to arrest this innocent guy.
translation.ko: 무고한 사람이 체포되도록 가만히 있었던 거죠

translation.en: Now Zamokuhle is suing police.
I think it's about 17 million for wrongful arrest.
translation.ko: 엉뚱한 사람을 체포한 게 1,700만 건에 달할 거예요

translation.en: And I believe that he should also sue the people in the house,
translation.ko: 저는 그 집에 있던 사람들도 고소해야 한다고 봅니다

translation.en: actually the people who pointed him out at the identity parade.
translation.ko: 범인 식별 절차 때 자모쿨레를 지목한 사람들 말이죠

translation.en: [caller, in English] The people who can tell us what happened exactly,
translation.ko: 정확히 무슨 일이 있었다고 우리한테 말할 수 있는 건

translation.en: it's the people who were there at the day of the event.
translation.ko: 사건 당일 그 자리에 있었던 사람들입니다

translation.en: [caller 2] Kelly Khumalo and the South African police
translation.ko: "청취자 연결" 켈리 쿠말로와 남아공 경찰에게 책임을 물어야 해요

translation.en: need to be held accountable.
translation.ko: 켈리 쿠말로와 남아공 경찰에게 책임을 물어야 해요

translation.en: Kelly Khumalo knows a lot.
translation.ko: 켈리 쿠말로는 많은 걸 알고 있어요

translation.en: [Steenkamp, in English] When I interviewed Kelly,
she was totally uninvolved with me.
translation.ko: 저와 아무런 소통을 하지 않으려고 했어요

translation.en: No eye contact.
[in Afrikaans] She sat like this.
She looked very tired and irritated.
It was like, "Oh, just get over it."
As a policeman, I draw my own conclusions.
I realized… [in English] …something is just fishy here.
[in English] Her eyes.
Eyes… talk a lot.
[in Afrikaans] My sixth sense told me…
there is a story behind this story.
[in English] Something is wrong.
[wa Afrika, in English] According to the statement of the people who were in the house,
translation.ko: 그 집에 있었던 사람들의 진술을 보면

translation.en: they claim that when the gunmen walked into the house…
They spoke in Zulu, they said… [in Zulu] "Bring your cellphones."
translation.ko: 줄루 말을 했다고 주장합니다 휴대폰을 가져오라고 말했대요

translation.en: But none of their cellphones were taken.
Only one cellphone that belonged to Kelly was taken.
The cellphone, according to the police investigation,
was taken to a hostel which is near by Vosloorus.
translation.ko: 보슬루러스 인근의 한 호스텔로 이동한 뒤

translation.en: -That's where it was switched off. -[siren wailing]
[man] How are you feeling, Kelly?
We don't know why that particular cellphone was a target of the gunmen.
translation.ko: 강도들이 하필 그 휴대폰만 노린 이유를 모르겠습니다 "경찰, 켈리의 휴대폰 기록 분석 중"

translation.en: In that docket there is two affidavits by the Khumalos' direct neighbor.
translation.ko: 사건 기록에는 현장과 바로 인접한 이웃의 진술 2건이 있어요

translation.en: He's a retired police officer.
Him and his son saw something.
[man, in Zulu] I was sitting with my wife and we heard something strange.
translation.ko: 아내랑 같이 앉아 있다가 이상한 소리를 들었어요

translation.en: It sounded like people were pushing each other.
translation.ko: 사람들이 쿵쾅거리며 엎치락뒤치락하는 소리 같았죠 "레슬리 응카체 이웃"

translation.en: My wife said, "Something's happening next door."
translation.ko: 아내는 옆집에 무슨 일이 난 것 같다고 했어요

translation.en: [wa Afrika, in English] And that's when the former police officer took out his whistle,
translation.ko: 그때 전직 경찰이 호루라기를 꺼내 들었어요

translation.en: which is a sign in the township that there's trouble here.
translation.ko: 흑인 거주구에서 문제가 생기면 사용하는 신호죠

translation.en: He blew the whistle and all the neighbors came out.
translation.ko: 호루라기를 부니까 모든 이웃이 밖으로 나왔어요

translation.en: [in Zulu] Kelly's child was there. The young boy.
I think he was there when all this happened,
translation.ko: 그 사건이 벌어지는 내내 애가 거기 있었나 봐요

translation.en: because he was crying so much. My wife brought him here.
translation.ko: 엄청나게 우는 걸 보고 아내가 여기로 데려왔죠

translation.en: That child saw something terrible. She brought him here to rest.
translation.ko: 끔찍한 걸 봤던 것 같아요 아내가 아이를 데려와 다독였어요

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] A child can give valuable information.
translation.ko: 아이는 귀중한 정보를 줄 수 있어요

translation.en: Even if only a small piece of the puzzle.
It can help towards a breakthrough.
translation.ko: 실마리를 풀 돌파구가 될 수 있죠

translation.en: [in English] I wanted to interview Kelly's little boy.
Kelly said, "No, no, it is too traumatizing for the child."
translation.ko: 켈리는 아이에게 트라우마가 너무 클 거라며 거절했어요

translation.en: But surely you should be helping us understand what happened.
translation.ko: 그래도 무슨 일이 있었는지 이해하도록 도움을 줘야죠

translation.en: South Africans believe that she owes the nation at least an answer,
translation.ko: 남아공 사람들은 켈리 쿠말로가 단서까진 내놓지 않더라도 최소한 뭐라고 답변은 해야 한다고 믿어요

translation.en: if not a lead.
translation.ko: 최소한 뭐라고 답변은 해야 한다고 믿어요

translation.en: So that is the only thing South Africans are left with, to make their own judgment.
translation.ko: 국민들이 판단을 내리려면 그거라도 있어야 하거든요

translation.en: [chanting in Zulu] Kelly is a dog! Kelly is a dog!
[in English] If you have something to say,
if you have evidence on-- on Senzo's passing,
translation.ko: "켈리 쿠말로 2019년 4월" 센조의 죽음을 입증할 증거가 있다면

translation.en: why don't you approach the police station or the investigating officers
that are in charge of the case,
instead of dragging me down just because I'm in the public eye?
translation.ko: 세간에 알려진 사람이란 이유로 나만 물고 늘어지지 말고요

translation.en: I-- I was a victim on that night. And I'm not here to defend myself.
translation.ko: 전 그날 밤의 피해자예요 제 변호를 하러 나온 게 아닙니다

translation.en: The law will do that.
